biography: Dr. A. K. Grover is a distinguished ophthalmologist specializing in oculoplastic, orbital, and lacrimal surgery. He is the Chairman of the Department of Ophthalmology at Sir Ganga Ram Hospital and the founder of Vision Eye Centres in Delhi. Dr. Grover has served as the President of the All India Ophthalmological Society (AIOS) and the Asia Pacific Society of Ophthalmic Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery. He is a recipient of the Padma Shri for his significant contributions to eye care.
aiSummary: A. K. Grover is a Elite-tier (top 1%) ophthalmology specialist with an H-index of 110 at Vision Eye Centre (Chairman). Known for pioneered Pioneered oculoplastic surgery at Sir Ganga Ram Hospital, Introduced FRCS exams for higher medical standards in India. Has been published in Plant Science, Cell Stress and Chaperones, International Journal of Molecular Sciences and recipient of the Padma Shri (0). Based in New Delhi, Delhi, India.
